reviewText:
The 2nd Pack contains the following DBZ movies Italian dubbed and Japanese version:
Dragon Ball The Movie 2: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
Dragon Ball Special Movie: Path to Power
Dragon Ball Z The Movie 9: Bojack Unbound
Dragon Ball GT TV Special: A Hero's Legacy

In Italy, their PAL DVD releases of Dragon Ball: The Path to Power and Dragon Ball Z M09: Bojack Unbound are presented in letterbox even though those films were originally 16:9, however if you try to watch the Japanese version on these DVDs then you can never turn OFF the Italian dubtitles since Dynit was too cheap to make Italian subtitles for the Japanese track.
